Posts.Content: Gigi my prayers are with you, i hope you stay strong through all of this. Surround yourself with loved ones for that extra support. Â Hang in there.
Posts.Title: 2 1/2 years later another cancer.

Posts.Content: Hello Snanem i just came across your post and i have to say that this us a very difficult decision. It's one that unfortunately you have to make on your own. But i would definetly ask around and find out how some people have done with their decisions. There are many positive and negative things with either decision that you make. Please msg me id like to know how you're doing.
Posts.Title: How do you decide?
